caption: Taking shelter in a basement in eastern Ukraine. The nation’s president, Volodymyr Zelensky, spoke to President Biden on Monday.
image_1.context: Gathering each morning in the Oval Office for the global threat assessment known as the President’s Daily WASHINGTON — In a series of top-secret meetings last October, President Biden’s national security team presented grim intelligence that would soon trigger a fierce effort to prevent what could become the largest armed conflict in Europe since World War II. Vladimir V. Putin, the Russian president, was preparing to invade Ukraine, top intelligence and military officials told Mr. Biden. This article is by Michael D. Shear, Julian E. Barnes and Eric Schmitt. Inside the White House’s Race to Prevent an Invasion by Russia "All the News The Neu ork Cimes That's Fit to Print'" OL. CLXXI . . . No. 59,342 © 2022 The New York Times Company NEW YORK, TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 22, 2022 PUTIN ORDERS FORCES INTO EASTERN UKRAINE
image_1.description: The image depicts an elderly woman taking shelter in a basement in eastern Ukraine. She is wearing a brown jacket and a red headscarf, sitting on a wooden bench. The background shows a dimly lit underground space with graffiti on the ceiling and walls, and some debris scattered on the ground. The atmosphere conveys a sense of tension and urgency, reflecting the ongoing conflict in the region.

The Omicron variant can dodge antibodies — immune molecules that prevent the virus from infecting cells — produced after two doses of a Covid vaccine. image_2.description: The image depicts a man standing in an open field with a clear blue sky and scattered clouds. The man is wearing a black cowboy hat, a black long-sleeved shirt, and dark pants with a silver belt buckle. He has his hands in his pockets and is looking off to the side with a serious expression. In the background, there are leafless trees and a few scattered objects, including what appears to be farm equipment and a black cow. The overall atmosphere of the image conveys a sense of calmness and contemplation, with the man appearing to be deep in thought or reflecting on something.

image_3.context: President Biden’s initial reaction was cautious, limited to issuing a narrow set of sanctions aimed at two regions in eastern Ukraine that are partly controlled by Russian-backed separatists and that President Vladimir WASHINGTON — Russia’s decision to order troops into Ukraine on Monday presented the United States and Europe with the challenge of deciding how quickly to move in imposing stiff sanctions on Moscow, seeking to balance punishment, deterrence and maintaining unity among the allies. By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and DAVID E. SANGER U.S. and Its Allies Considering Timing and Scope of Response President Vladimir V. Putin recognized separatist regions. elected proWestern leaders as stooges and cast them as the aggressors — even though Russia has $^{190,000}$ troops, including allied separatist fighters, surrounding Ukraine. “As for those who captured and are holding onto power in Kyiv, we demand that they immediately cease military action,” Mr. Putin said at the end of his speech, referring to Ukraine’s capital. “If not, the complete responsibility for the possibility of a continuation of bloodshed will be fully and wholly on the conscience of the regime ruling the territory of Ukraine.” It was a thinly veiled threat against the government of PresiContinued on Page A10
image_3.description: The image shows a man seated at a wooden desk, gesturing with his right hand. He is wearing a black suit jacket, a white dress shirt, and a dark red tie. His expression appears serious and engaged, suggesting he is in the midst of speaking or explaining something. The background features a wooden panel wall, and to the left, there is a partial view of a flag with blue and orange colors. The overall setting suggests a formal environment, possibly an office or a meeting room.

image_4.description: The image depicts a woman standing by a railing near a body of water, likely a lake or sea, with snow-capped mountains in the background. She is wearing a blue jacket with a white scarf and has her hair tied back. In her right hand, she holds a bag of snacks, which appears to be chips. Two seagulls are flying close to her, one of which is reaching out to grab a piece of food from the bag. The woman seems to be feeding the seagulls, and her posture suggests she is enjoying the interaction. The sky is overcast, and the overall atmosphere conveys a sense of calmness and connection with nature. The water is relatively calm, and the distant mountains add a serene backdrop to the scene.

image_5.description: The image captures a thrilling moment at a horse racing event. The main focus is on a jockey dressed in a blue and white racing outfit, riding a powerful brown horse. The jockey is leaning forward, urging the horse to sprint with determination. The horse's muscles are taut, and its hooves kick up dirt as it races across the track. In the background, there is a large crowd of spectators filling the stands, creating an atmosphere of excitement and anticipation. The spectators are dressed in various colors, adding to the vibrant scene. The grandstand features a distinctive clock tower, which adds a historical and iconic element to the setting. The sky above is clear, suggesting a sunny day, which enhances the overall atmosphere of the event.

image_6.description: The image depicts three gorillas in a natural setting, likely a forest or jungle. The gorilla on the left is standing upright with its back to the camera, showcasing its large, muscular build and dark fur. Its posture suggests it might be observing something or protecting its family. The gorilla in the center is sitting on the ground, facing the camera, with a young gorilla clinging to its back. The young gorilla appears to be resting or sleeping, indicating a sense of safety and comfort. The background is lush with green foliage, suggesting a dense forest environment. The overall atmosphere conveys a sense of tranquility and familial bonds among the gorillas.
